title: Help me Bugged :c !
body:
Alright so i just launched my league client after a break of like 5 hours... or so..
And i get this?
I didn't even start a game , last thing i remember someone inviting me into a custom match , i remember accepting it but it didn't bring me into the queue or the champion select i went and told him he is not fighting me and hes figthing someone else he didn't really reply but i ended up blocking him cause he was a bit of a pain when i solo qued he typed alot to me to duo quo cause i was carrying most** 
But yeah can someone help i have not left a game im pretty sure i haven't check match history or smthing?
And evry time i click the recconect it i just see a black screen?!

replies.body: I took a look into this for you with the information provided, and was unable to locate any issues.  Are you still seeing the Reconnect screen, or have you returned to the client lobby now?

Acctualy im fine sorry for disturbing you..
It was my friend playing on my account..
He didn't tell me up untill now..

Again sorry for disturbing you.
